about_the_game:
Mirrormind is a 3D Puzzle Platformer in a unique lo-fi dithered style where you can shift perspective into any person you can see. Journey through a series of worlds where each world explores a shift in perspective. These shifts include an exploration of gravity, the 2nd person perspective, and more.

  • Explore 4 visually striking worlds about switching perspectives: using different directions of gravity, controlling yourself in the 2nd person perspective and switching between past and present.

  • Over 30 different puzzles, each focused on showing some unique and interesting consequence of its mechanics.

  • Unique undo system where you can reverse time to quickly explore other solutions.

  • A parallel and optional narrative exploring themes of perspective, senses, sights and experience.

Mirrormind treats your time as precious; there is no filler in this game and the levels have been crafted to minimize tedium and frustration. There are no puzzles that require a high degree of dexterity.
